SELECT ID as "id", DONG_CD as "regionCd", DONG_NM as "regionNm", COORD as "coord", COALESCE(b."cnt",0) AS "cnt" FROM (SELECT ID, DONG_CD, DONG_NM, ST_ASTEXT(GEOM) coord FROM CM_AREA_DONG_CD a WHERE ST_GEOMETRYTYPE(GEOM) LIKE 'ST_MultiPolygon' AND DONG_CD::text LIKE '%'||#{sigCode}||'%' ORDER BY ID ASC) a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.AREA_CD) AS "rnum", a.AREA_CD AS "areaCd", SUM(CASE WHEN a.AREA_CD = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS "cnt" FROM CM_EVT_OCR a WHERE 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EVT_OCR_YMD_HMS, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{timeS}
AND #{timeE} >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EVT_OCR_YMD_HMS, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY AREA_CD) b ON a.DONG_CD::text=b."areaCd" ORDER BY DONG_NM

SELECT a.EVT_ID as "evtId", a.EVT_NM as "evtNm", COALESCE(b."cnt",0) AS "cnt" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT(a.EVT_ID),b.EVT_NM FROM CM_EVT_OCR a JOIN CM_EVENT b ON a.EVT_ID=b.EVT_ID) a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT EVT_ID,COUNT(EVT_ID) AS "cnt" FROM CM_EVT_OCR WHERE AREA_CD::text LIKE '%'||#{areaCd}||'%'
AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EVT_OCR_YMD_HMS, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{timeS}
AND #{timeE} >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EVT_OCR_YMD_HMS, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY EVT_ID) b ON a.EVT_ID=b.EVT_ID ORDER BY a.EVT_NM ASC

SELECT b."purpose" AS "nm", SUM(CASE WHEN b."areaCd" =null THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) AS "cnt" FROM ( SELECT c.DE_CD_NM AS "purpose", a.AREA_CD::text AS "areaCd" FROM FACILITY_S a INNER JOIN CCTV_BRK_LOG b ON (a.FCLT_ID = b.FCLT_ID ) INNER JOIN DETAIL_CD c ON (b.PURPOSE = c.DE_CD) WHERE 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(b.INSERT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #{timeS}
AND #{timeE} >= TO_CHAR(b.INSERT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND a.AREA_CD IS NOT NULL ) b WHERE 1=1 AND b."areaCd" LIKE '%'||#{areaCd}||'%' GROUP BY b."purpose"
SELECT SI_CD AS "code", SI_NM AS "label", CITY_LAT AS "lat", CITY_LON AS "lon", CITY_SCALE AS "scale" FROM CM_AREA_SI_CD
